backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, hydration, sleep, running logs, and custom reminders with access control and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related frontend files, components, and confidence metadata for recent app enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file providing short descriptions of each frontend component, hook, and view for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions including OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that defines the root element and loads the main TypeScript application module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, reminders, hydration UI, and tab navigation for sleep, running, history, and settings.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time profile creation collecting the user's display name and saving it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: Placeholder card shown when no hydration history exists, encouraging the user to start logging intake.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Displays water intake history, including daily progress, averages, and goal indicators using sorted logs.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Provides quick and custom water intake logging with preset amounts and input validation.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Shows today's water intake progress toward the daily goal with remaining amount or goal-achieved status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the main app header with branding, optional user greeting, and login button.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays a temporary in-app reminder banner with icon, message, and dismiss control.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Manages hydration reminders, including permission status, starting/pausing reminders, and CRUD for custom reminders.
frontend/src/components/running/RunHisto: Shows running history with recent stats, sorted logs, and formatted distance, pace, and time info.
frontend/src/components/running/RunLogFo: Form to log a run with distance, duration, pace calculation, completion status, and input validation.
frontend/src/components/running/RunningV: Displays the running tracker with a form to log runs and a list of past run history.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Provides a form to view and update user hydration settings with validation and backend syncing.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepHisto: Fetches and displays sleep history with averages, progress bars, and daily breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepLogFo: Form for logging hours slept with input validation and backend submission.
Composes the sleep tracker page with a log form and history list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, hydration, sleep, and related backend data.
Provides a hook to manage hydration reminders with notification permission handling, interval scheduling, and fallback inâ€‘app reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSchedulerC: Implements a context-based reminder scheduler supporting multiple reminder types, notification handling, and shared app-wide reminder state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a hydration-themed OKLCH color system with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project features, requirements, and metadata for expanding the app into a broader health reminder and tracking system.
